entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. High 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
